item.title: MSSQL | Potatos and how to not use them
item.description: Note: Before you dive in, I want to point out that this post does not explore deep, low-level technical details. It’s a proof of concept for an alternative technique that I haven’t seen anyone else cover, so I decided to write about it. I don’t think it will provide major benefits, but it might be useful for some red team engagements, especially when using Living off the Land and it is a fun technique.
